help-file.title: SKILL_DREADLORD
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills available to the Dreadlord class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 2h bludgeon, 2h slashing, bandage, carve, climb, dodge, double attack, first aid, fishing, hitall, kick, mine, mount, parry, retreat, riposte, swim, unarmed damage 11th level: flank, battle senses 21st level: call of the grave, gaze 26th level: switch opponents, tainted blade 31st level: blood scent 36th level: command aura 51st level: battle orders, triple attack 56th level: quadruple attack
Dreadlord Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Deathlord, Shadowlord
